known_issues: Mark as hallmark action fails to update the order status when selecting an order line.
Staff portal is not fetching/displaying orders for viewing and status updates.

existing_features.title: Ensure Admin and Staff portals reflect successful hallmark updates by refreshing orders and removing newly-updated "given_to_hallmark" orders from the "Total Orders" list after marking as hallmark.

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement backend support for bulk order status updates so that the Admin/Staff "Mark as Hallmark" action can update selected order lines to status "given_to_hallmark".
Fix backend authorization/approval logic so Staff users can fetch orders in the staff portal (getOrders) without being blocked by the approval gate immediately after profile creation.

projectName: Fix hallmark status update and staff portal orders loading
